title.narrative: Consortium on Growth and High Volume Transport Research

description.narrative: This activity (Consortium on Growth and High Volume Transport Research) is a component of Research on Growth and High Volume Transport in Low Income Countries reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £12,242,432. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Transport policy and administrative management, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: IMC Worldwide. The start date is 22-01-2016 and the end date is 30-01-2025.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
